Header: Court orders five media institutions to provide full statement of Vijayakala
Content: The Court has given instructions to five media establishments to provide to the Organized Crime Prevention Division the unedited video footage of the controversial statement made by former State Minister Vijayakala Maheshwaran. The Police had received a complaint saying that Vijayakala Maheshwaran had made a statement that the LTTE should be re-established. The complaint has been made by National Organizer of the Sinhala Ravaya Organization the Ven. Magalkande Sudantha Thera. Based on this complaint the Organized Crimes Prevention Division had reported facts. It is based on this submission that the Court is seeking video footage containing her statement.
